column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I somehow managed to squeeze in a tiny crevice of space in my stomach to finish off with some of Bavette's ice cream ($8). We went with the chocolate and added the complimentary magicbrick. I don't know how we did it (probably because it was wonderful)
column2: but we managed to clean up nearly the whole dessert! Loved adding the shell on top and chipping away at the chocolate candy topping.
